benefits.title: Instant payments
benefits.description: One of the biggest advantages of using QR codes is that it facilitates instant payment. Making payment via QR codes is extremely quick as compared to other modes of payment

benefits.title: Top-grade security
benefits.description: Making payments via QR codes is very secure. It’s because the QR code is nothing but just a tool that is used to exchange information. Any data which is transferred via QR codes is encrypted with SHA-2 algorithm thus making the payment fullproof secure

benefits.title: Easy to set up
benefits.description: Setting up QR code payments is extremely easy. You don’t need much infrastructure. You only require a smartphone with a camera and a QR code which is either printed or in the electronic form. The usage of QR code replace other payment terminals

benefits.title: Higher reliability
benefits.description: QR code payments are a fullproof payment method as it eliminates the probability of any kind of error. It increase reliability because of immediate generation of payment receipt on both sides (merchant and client)

benefits.title: Instant payments
benefits.description: One of the biggest advantages of using QR codes is that it facilitates instant payment. Making payment via QR codes is extremely quick as compared to other modes of payment. All a user has to do is simply open the QR code scan app, scan the QR code, and confirm to process the payment. Within a few seconds, the payments are made.

benefits.title: Top-grade security
benefits.description: Making payments via QR codes is very secure. It’s because the QR code is nothing but just a tool that is used to exchange information. Any data which is transferred via QR codes is encrypted thus making the payment foolproof secure

benefits.title: Easy to set up
benefits.description: Setting up QR code payments is extremely easy. You don’t need much infrastructure. You only require a smartphone with a camera and a QR code which is either printed or in the electronic form. The usage of QR codes for payments also eliminates the requirement of point of sale machines or any other special equipment used for payments.

benefits.title: Higher reliability
benefits.description: QR code payments are a foolproof payment method as it eliminates the probability of any kind of error. The pattern of black boxes consists of unique data which enhances the reliability of the QR code payments.

uses.title: We built our business on great customer service
Can be used at stores and retail outlets

qr-payment.subheading: Scan QR codes and make transactions easily.

expand-menu.description: Static QR codes are used for facilitating quick and simple payments in various industries like delivery service, in-home services, in-store retails, taxi drivers, and street vendors.
France-Pay Dynamic QR offers a solution where the merchant can control the amount to be paid by the client
Merchants can request the amount to the clients using client's F-Pay ID

QRContent.description: Static QR codes are used for facilitating quick and simple payments in various industries like delivery service, in-home services, in-store retails, taxi drivers, and street vendors.
Paytm Dynamic QR offers a solution where the merchant is in control of the amount paid through QR code.
Fpay soundbox confirms the payment within seconds in-Store. The sound of the Fpay soundbox is absolutely amazing, it's clearly audible, clean

features.main: Enable fast, simple & secure online payments
features.description: Let your customers shop, order & pay hassle-free.Fpay provides secure QR code solutions and wallet payment options for customers
Accept payments from any customer and payments get settled in your bank account at the end of day.
Collect error-free payments faster at the cash counter by displaying QR on your POS terminal

features.main: Print and stick static QR codes at your cash counter
features.description: Generate digital invoices  and receive multiple payments simultaniously
